Chief complaint.description: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe in the patient's words)

symptom_n.name: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:null)
symptom_n.length: blank (data_type:number, range_candidate_guide:0-24 (Unit: week, over 24 is represented as 24))

Present illness.triggering factor: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:The reason patient came to the hospital at this time)
Present illness.stressor: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:(multiple answers available) home/work/school/legal issue/medical comorbidity/interpersonal difficulty/null)

Family history.presence: blank (data_type:boolean, range_candidate_guide: Randomize(50%) the presence or absence of family history. If 'false', then remove all children of 'Family history' except this 'presence' which has 'false' as a child.)
Family history.diagnosis_n: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide: Describe a psychiatric family history. Given the patient's current diagnosis, set a probable family history.)
Family history.substance_use_n: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide: Describe a family history of substance use (alcohol, opioid, cannabinoid, hallucinogen, stimulant, narcotic, etc.).)

Developmental/Social history.abnormality in prenatal/birthing history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) presence/absence. If yes, write a description; otherwise, enter null.)
Developmental/Social history.delay in developmental milestone: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) presence/absence. If yes, write a description; otherwise, enter null.)

childhood history.social environment: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe things like number and quality of friends.)

Developmental/Social history.school history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:special education/learning disorder/behavioral problem/low academic performance/problem in extracurricular activity)
Developmental/Social history.work history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe things like job, performance, reason for switching jobs, relationship with supervisor, coworker, etc.)

Mental Status Examination.Insight: blank (candidate:Complete denial of illness/Slight awareness of being sick and needing help, but denying it at the same time/Awareness of being sick but blaming it on others, external events/Intellectual insight/True emotional insight)
Mental Status Examination.Perception: blank (candidate:Normal/Illusion/Auditory hallucination/Visual hallucination/Olfactory hallucination/Gustatory hallucination/Depersonalization/Derealization/Déjà vu/Jamais vu)
Mental Status Examination.Thought process: blank (candidate:Normal/Loosening of association/flight of idea/circumstantiality/tangentiality/Word salad or incoherence/Neologism/Illogical/Irrelevant)
